reviewText:
This video set will walk you through the bare basics of how to forge... No fancy several hundred dollar anvils or exhaust fan bellows setups here!
One of the examples is literally the original, most primitive method of forging that's known to man!
If you wanna learn the subtle and delicate art of crafting beautiful works of intricately crafted blades..  LOOK ELSEWHERE!
  If you want the knowledge and ability to custom create a functional tool or weapon in close to any situation...
Look no further!
